data.title: The Pink Hope Project in Bladensburg, MD
data.meta_description: The Pink Hope Project Initiative provides hope by collecting clothes, shoes, and toiletries to benefit those that are in need.
data.text:
Gift Wrapping Service

The Gift Wrapping Service is the Pink Hope Project Charities, Inc. fundraiser to help benefit the operational & program expenses of the charity. All contributions are tax-deductible. We are a registered 501c3 organization recognized by the IRS. $5 per gift. Gifts will be confirmed on-site. You are welcome to bring your preferred wrapping paper and bow. All gifts must be labelled so they are wrapped accordingly. We are not responsible for any damaged, broken, or lost gifts. A thorough count of the gifts will be recorded and given once the gifts are returned. No refunds. This is a charitable effort to raise money for our organization.

$5 per gift Â· 1 day
